title: States That Allow Same-Sex Marriage Often Lack Job Protection Laws For Gays
teaser: A federal judge in Wyoming will hear arguments Wednesday morning about whether to start issuing marriage licenses to gay couples. Same-sex marriage is legal in a majority of states. But some of those states lack legal protection for gay people in the workplace. For some, that means they may be able to be legally married, but they can also be legally fired.
